subject: Prob. in extending TestCase class
msgSnippet: Hi, I am using Junit Framwork for Testing our java product. we have created 5 testXXX method to test diff. functionality. for all the method some API call is
messageBody:
Hi,
I am using Junit Framwork for Testing our java product. we have
created 5 testXXX method to test diff. functionality. for all the
method some API call is required,that we have difine in setUp() which
is same for all 5 testXXX method. now whenever i run the case It
create 5 diff. object of the class and it is calling 5 time setUp()
method for each textXXX call.

Can we do it in single call ? How ?

Thanks in advance,
Pranav.
